Ana Maria - sells food.  Paulina - sells food.  Paulina - sells shoes from a catalogue.  Delfina - sells shoes from a catalogue.  Francisca Graciela - sells shoes from a catalogue.  They thank Vision Fund for helping all women workers who want to expand their businesses.

loans.use: to buy plants and flower pots to sell.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es:
Pedro tiene 63 años de edad, vive con su esposa, sus hijos ya están independizados, su vivienda se encuentra ubicada en el distrito agrícola de Cayaltí, ubicado a una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales. El cría aves de corral y cerdos en corrales ubicados cerca de su domicilio desde hace más de 15 años. Cuando los animales se desarrollan completamente los ofrece en venta en el mercado de la ciudad, gracias a esta actividad ha podido solventar la economía de su familia durante los últimos años.

Pedro necesita realizar algunas reparaciones en su vivienda, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles que le ayuden en su objetivo, el es una persona bastante trabajadora y responsable, las personas que le conocen le consideran alguien honrado y de buen corazón. Pedro agradece de antemano a las personas que le ayudarán a lograr su objetivo a través de este préstamo.
texts.en:
Pedro is 62 years old, lives with his wife, has children that are now independent, and lives in the agricultural district of Cayaltí which is located one hour from the city of Chiclayo.

He raises livestock for a living. He has been raising chickens and pigs in corrals located close to his home for 15 years. Once the animals have grown a certain size he sells them in the city’s market. Thanks to this work he been able to provide for his family these past years.

Pedro needs to repair some parts of his home. This is why he requested Edpyme Alternativa a 1500 Peruvian Soles loan. He is a very hardworking and responsible person. People that know him consider him to be an honorable man with a good heart. Pedro is thankful for the people that have helped him with his goals and supported him with the loan.

loans.use: repair his home

loans.name: Eden

texts.en:
This is Eden, 52, a resident of Pasay City, Philippines. She is a mother of five children, four of whom are in school. One of her children is already working. Together with her husband, Eden manages her household while operating her business. She works hard to continually provide income for her family's everyday expenses.

Eden operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a variety store is basically a small convenience store that sells groceries, toiletries, and beverages piecemeal to the local neighborhood. It is the place to go to buy a sachet of shampoo, 5 PHP worth of cooking oil, or an egg. Eden earns a profit through getting supplies at wholesale prices and selling them by the piece. Her store is located adjacent to her house and her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. Eden also sells breakfast snacks and rice at her store to earn additional income. She earns a minimum of 450 PHP in sales every day.

Eden is requesting a 25,000 PHP loan to buy groceries, toiletries, and beverages to expand her inventory. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands. Eden faithfully meets up weekly with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work and draw strength and inspiration from studying the Word of God. 

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners that gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay micro finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for grocery items and products needed in her business.

loans.name: Alfredo Hugo

texts.es:
Alfredo es un joven de 30 años el cual es muy trabajador y entusiasta, vive al lado de su esposa y juntos tienen un pequeñito de tan solo 6 meses de edad, por quien da la vida con  tal de darle lo mejor y sobre todo mucho amor. Su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Camana, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener playas hermosas, un clima cálido y sobre todo por su agricultura en especial el cultivo de arroz, considerado uno de los mejores del mundo. Cuando dispone de un tiempo libre le gusta mucho mirar películas y en ocasiones le gusta preparar uno de sus platillos favoritos el son las riquísimas lentejas. El tuvo estudios secundarios, pero le hubiera gustado mucho estudiar para ser técnico en construcción.

Día a día Alfredo trabaja muy duro en su negocio como albañil, el trabaja alrededor de 10 horas al día y puede atender hasta 8 clientes en el mes ya que depende mucho del tamaño de las construcciones; el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy dedicado a su trabajo y porque es muy responsable y cumplido con sus clientes.

Alfredo está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar herramientas como martillos, combas, madera, entre otros, lo que  le permitirá tener las herramientas adecuadas para realizar su trabajo, así el podrá seguir trabajando y luchando cada día para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Comprar una motocarga”.
texts.en:
Alfredo is a young man of 30 who is very hard-working and enthusiastic.  He lives with his wife at his side and together they have a little one of just six months of age, to whom he dedicates his life to give him the best and above all much love.  His house is located in the city of Camana, which is characterized by beautiful beaches, a warm climate and above all its agriculture, especially the cultivation of rice, considered some of the best in the world.

When he has free time he likes to watch movies and occasionally to make one of his favorite dishes: delicious lentils.  He went to secondary school but he would have liked to study to be a construction technician.

Day by day, Alfredo works very hard in his business as a bricklayer.  He works about 10 hours a day and can take care of about eight clients a month, depending on the size of the project.  He believes his business is going well because he is very dedicated to his work and he is very responsible and punctual with his clients.  

Alfredo is very thankful to the Kiva lenders since thanks to the help that they have given he has been able to  buy tools such as hammers, sledgehammers, wood and other materials that permit him to have adequate tools to complete his work.  In this way he can continue working and struggling every day to make his big dream a reality:  "To buy a three wheeled pick-up."

loans.use: to buy tools (hammers, sledgehammers, and wood, among others).

loans.name: Elizabeth Roxana

texts.es:
Elizabeth es una mujer de 30 años, vive en la ciudad de Cañete, en el distrito de Imperial, ella se encuentra felizmente casada, tiene 2 pequeños hijos, a quienes dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacarlos adelante, ella es una mujer muy alegre,  trabajadora y entusiasta.

Elizabeth y su esposo provienen de familias que siempre se han dedicado a la actividad ganadera, es así como ambos se conocieron; gracias a su espíritu emprendedor y al apoyo de su esposo, desde hace 10 años, Elizabeth puso en marcha su pequeño negocio de venta de leche,  ella cuenta con 9 vacas productoras de leche y 8 vaquillonas o terneras, algunas de ellas fueron heredadas por sus padres y otras fueron compradas con sus ahorros.

Elizabeth se siente muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la construcción de un corral y un comedero para sus vacas, ella realizará la compra de fierro, cemento, ladrillos y madera; de esta manera podrá criar y alimentar a sus vacas en un ambiente adecuado, así con ellos en poco  tiempo espera poder incrementar sus ingresos económicos y asegurar el bienestar y futuro de sus pequeños hijos.
texts.en:
Elizabeth is a 30 year old woman.  She lives in the city of Cañete, in the Imperial district.  She is happily married with two small children and dedicates all of her efforts to getting them ahead in life.  She is a happy, hard-working, enthusiastic woman.  

Elizabeth and her husband come from families that have always been engaged in livestock farming; this is how they met.  Ten years ago, thanks to her entrepreneurial spirit and support of her husband, Elizabeth started her small business, selling milk.  She has nine dairy cows and eight heifers or calves; she inherited some of them from her parents and bought the others with her savings.  

Elizabeth feels very grateful for the Kiva loans because thanks to the support offered, she will be able to build a coral and a feeding place for her cows.  She will purchase iron, cement, bricks, and wood.  In this way, she will be able to raise and feed her cows in an appropriate manner. In a short time, she hopes her dairy cows will enable her to increase her income and assure the welfare and future of her small children.

loans.use: to build a coral and feeding place for her cows.

loans.name: Don

texts.en:
Don is 22 years old. She is married and blessed with two children. Don lives in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia, and for the last two years, has been producing palm leaf boxes to sell. Her husband is a construction worker who earns about 5 USD per day. 

Don is requesting a 500 USD loan to purchase a motorbike for commuting. Her family's transportation difficulties will be eased and her loan will enable her to save the money spent on transportation to use to support her family. In the future, Don would like to run a souvenir shop to earn more income for her family and she would like to help her children earn bachelors degrees. Don also hopes to rebuild her present house to make it more comfortable for her family.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting

loans.name: Pov

texts.en:
Pov is 50 years old. She is a mother of five children and resides with her husband in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in growing rice for more than ten years, earning approximately $2 per day. Her husband is a construction worker who earns about $8 per day. Three of her children are employed. They earn about $17 per day. 

In order to improve her farming work, Pov is requesting a loan of $1,000 to purchase cattle to use for tilling her farmland. In the future, she would like to run a grocery store at home and help her children earn a higher education. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it bigger and more convenient for her family.

loans.use: to purchase cattle to use for tilling her farmland.

loans.name: Isai

texts.es:
Isaí, vive con su familia, sus padres y hermanos, él está soltero, administra una panadería que junto a su familia han iniciado, Isai aprendió este trabajo siendo primeramente empleado de una panadería, una vez conociendo todo el proceso se decidió por instalar su propio negocio. no tiene un horario fijo para realizar el pan.
Él solicita un préstamo para la compra de materiales que interviene en la producción de pan harina, azúcar, huevos, jaleadas, levadura, este préstamo le ayudará con los recursos económicos permitiéndole tener lo necesario para trabajar y aumentar la producción.
Su objetivo será en un futuro tener su propia casa, formar su familia y crecer en la panadería, abasteciendo a un mejor número de clientes.
texts.en: Isai is single and lives with his parents and siblings.  He manages a bakery that he started with his family.  Isai learned this work as an employee in a bakery.  Once he understood the process, he decided to start his own business.  He does not have a fixed schedule to make bread.  He is requesting a loan to buy materials involved in bread-making:  flour, sugar , eggs and yeast.  This loan will help him with the economic resources necessary to work and increase his production.  His future goal is to have his own house, create a family and grow the bakery by serving a greater number of customers.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, eggs and yeast.

loans.name: Pablo Enrique

texts.es:
Don Pablo continua con el cultivo de piñas y gracias al apoyo de su esposa quien con su trabajo se dividen los gastos del hogar, ademas don Pablo trabaja como albañil, con este nuevo credito le dara mantenimiento a dos manzanas de piña ya que con las lluvias tienden a propagarse las plagas y para que los siembros esten en buen estado hay darle mantenimiento. el comprara insumos como. completo, urea, fertilizante y otros. con estos insumos la produccion de piña es de calidad y asi las podran pagar a buen precio.
Agradece a Afodenic la confianza prestada nuevamente.
texts.en:
Don Pablo grows pineapples and thanks to the help of his wife with whom he works they cover their household expenses.  Pablo also works as a bricklayer.  With this new loan he will improve his 3.4 acres of pineapple fields since with the rains the pests tend to increase and one has to maintain the crops in a good state.

He will buy supplies such as fertilizer and urea, among others.  With these supplies his pineapples will be of high quality and will get a good price.  He thanks Afrodenic for their renewed confidence.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Jose Jesus

texts.es: El Sr Jesús tiene dos años viviendo con uno de sus hijos ya que esta separado de su esposa, construyo un cuarto pequeño de madera para vivir. Ya esta pensionado es persona muy activa, trabaja como empacador en un supermercado, pues no quiere ser una carga para su familia. Necesita arreglar el techo de su cuarto ya que se moja mucho cuando llueve.
texts.en:
Jesús has lived with one of his children for the past two years since he separated from his wife. He built a small room of wood to live in. He is retired and is a very active person, working as a bagger in a supermarket as he does not want to be a burden to his family. 

He needs to fix the roof of his room as it gets wet when it rains.

loans.use: to fix his wooden roof.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es:
La socia Isabel sigue perteneciendo al banco comunal “MUJERES UNIDAS” de la Asociación Arariwa. 

La socia Isabel sigue administrando el negocio de servicio de transportes, ella es una mujer emprendedora que saca adelante  a su familia. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad Isabel requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento de los carros.  

La socia Isabel agradece y expresa su satisfacción de poder seguir creciendo con su negocio propio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago  de su deuda en el plazo establecido.
texts.en: Isabel is still a member of the "MUJERES UNIDAS" communal bank.  She is still the manager of a transportation service business.  She is an enterprising woman who is raising her family.  She has worked in this business for several years and it is going very well.  Isabel is now requesting a loan to maintain her cars.  Isabel is grateful and satisfied to be able to continue growing her own business, and commits to making her payments according to the established schedule.

loans.use: to maintain her cars.

loans.name: Celiz Alexandra

texts.es: Alexandra Celiz tiene la actividad económica de pulpería. Hace más de 10 años que se dedica a este negocio  surgió por la necesidad de tener un ingreso para su familia .Alexandra  siempre ha sido una mujer muy responsable, pues siempre está esforzándose para mejorar su calidad de vida. Este no es el primer financiamiento que solicita por lo que es así que su negocio ha podido mejorar así podrá comprar golosinas, refrescos naturales, jugos, detergentes, sopas y granos básicos. Ella desea ampliar su negocio para mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Alexandra Celiz runs a small grocery store.  She has worked in this business for more than 10 years, which came out of the need to create an income for her family.  Alexandra has always been a very responsible woman, since she is always working to improve her quality of life.  

This in not the first loan that she has requested and because of this her business has improved.  She will buy candies, natural sodas, juices, soups and basic groceries.  She wants to grow her business to improve her income.

loans.use: to buy candies, natural soft drinks, juices, detergents, soups and basic groceries.  She wants to increase her business to improve her income.

loans.name: Fiorella Del Carmen

texts.es:
Fiorella tiene 25 años de edad, ella es conviviente.  Vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hijo, la casa está ubicada en una zona rural llamado Caserío Pedregal Alto  Distrito de  Tambogrande del departamento de Piura, donde no cuentan con los servicios básicos. 

Fiorella se dedica a la venta de ropa para damas y caballeros los cuales los vende recorriendo caseríos cercanos donde tiene clientela conocida y cobra semanalmente, Esta actividad la realizan desde hace más de 1 año. Adicionalmente cuenta con ingresos producto de su negocio de crianza y venta de animales. Su esposo agricultor y juntos tratan de sacar adelante a su familia.

Fiorella esta solicitando un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 para que ella comprar mas prendas de vestir,de modo que pueda ofrecer a sus clientes prendas de temporada y de ese modo incrementar sus ventas y seguir creciendo en su negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida.

Ella ya había solicitado un crédito financiado a través de Kiva y gracias a ello su negocio pudo crecer, por lo que se encuentra bastante agradecida con las personas que le ayudaron en aquella ocasión, del mismo modo agradece de antemano a las personas que le ayudarán ahora.
texts.en:
Fiorella is 25 years old and has a partner. She lives at home with her husband and son. Her home is located in a rural area called Caserío Pedregal Alto of the Tambogrande district, Piura department, and lacks basic services.

Fiorella sells women’s and men’s clothing for a living. She sells them to other farmhouses nearby. She has clientele there that she charges weekly. She also raises livestock for a living. Her husband is a farmer and together they work hard to help their family have a better life.

Fiorella is requesting Edpyme Alternativa a 1000 Peruvian soles loan to buy clothes. She want to offer her clients clothes that are in fashion this season to increase profits and continue growing her business to improve her living conditions.

She has already been granted a loan by Kiva and thanks to that loan her business was able to grow. She is very thankful for the people that helped her during that time and is also thankful for the individuals that are helping her now for this loan.

loans.use: offer her clients clothes that are in fashion this season

loans.name: Nelly Ludgarda

texts.es: La socia Nelly se sigue dedicándose al negocio de compra y venta de ropa de forma independiente. La socia Nelly también se dedica a repartir sus catálogos de productos de belleza. La socia Nelly desea seguir trabajando y para ello cuenta con una actividad física y con un carisma ejemplar. La socia en esta ocasión desea invertir el crédito en la compra de productos de belleza como por ejemplo aretes, perfumes, collares y otras cosas más.
texts.en:
Nelly continues to make her living in the business of independently buying and selling clothes. Nelly also works distributing beauty products catalogs. She wants to continue working and she has the physical activity and exemplary charisma to do so. 

She now wants to invest the loan into the purchase of beauty products like earrings, perfumes, necklaces and other things.

loans.use: to buy beauty products.

loans.name: Josiel Rigoberto

texts.es: El señor Josiel Rigoberto tiene 29 años, casado ,con un hijo menor de de edad tiene por actividad económica una pulpería ubicada en su casa de habitación, Tiene más de 6 años en su negocio, el negocio surgió por la necesidad de tener  ingresos para la mantención de su familia ya que no encontraba un trabajo fino, El motivo del crédito que realiza es un medio de apoyo para comprar granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, refrescos, galletas, detergentes, sopas entre otros. Espera en el futuro tener un negocio más grande.
texts.en:
Josiel Rigoberto is 29 years old, married and has one minor child.  His business is a small grocery store located in his house.  He has more than six years working in his business which grew out of the need to have an income to maintain his family since he couldn't find regular work.  

The purpose of the loan is to buy basic groceries, soft drinks, candies, crackers, detergents and soups, among other items.  He hopes to have a larger business in the future.

loans.use: to buy basic groceries, soft drinks, candies, crackers, detergents and soups, among other items.  He hopes to have a larger business in the future.

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en:
This is Lydia, 49, resident of Pasay City, Philippines. She is a widow and a mother. Most of her children have their own families, except for one who still lives with her. She manages her own household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Lydia operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a variety store is a small convenience store, which sells groceries, toiletries, and beverages to the local neighborhood. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, PHP 5 worth of cooking oil, or an egg. She earns money by getting supplies at wholesale prices and selling by the piece. She also operates a small computer shop for additional income. Her store is located adjacent to her house. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of PHP 550 in sales every day.

To help her to continue the operation of her business, she is requesting a loan of PHP 20,000. She will be using the loan to buy groceries, toiletries, and beverages to increase her product inventory. She expects a boost in revenue as her business grows. 

Lydia hopes to be able to expand soon and dreams of being able to give her family a good future through all of her hard work. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members* to share stories of her work every week and to draw strength and inspiration from the word of God, which she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items and products needed in her business.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.es:
Teresa, es habitante de la comunidad el Maniadero, es viuda, tiene 8 hijos, mayores  de edad, todos terminaron la secundaria. Cuando ella era joven se dedicaba a la crianza de cerdo y gallina, actividad que tradicionalmente se les enseña a las mujeres del campo, mientras realizan las tareas del hogar y cuidan de sus hijos. Fue precisamente uno de los Hijos de Teresa quien le sugirió que sembrara arroz, así fue como empezó a introducirse en esa actividad, ella tuvo que vender 2 vacas  ya que necesitaba capital de trabajo para realizar esta actividad.  Pero sus hijos fueron de mucha ayuda  clave para poder sembrar, vende su cosecha en su misma comarca donde considera es mas segura la venta de su cultivo. Ella tiene como proyecto poner una pulpería bien surtida ya que en su comarca las pulperías son muy pocas y no tienen productos de necesidad y consumo para la gente de su comarca, además de realizarle mejores a su humilde vivienda. 
Ella realizo el crédito para pagar el alquiler de una manzana de tierra y sembrar  arroz de riego. Este le ayudara a conseguir más rápidamente las condiciones óptimas para sembrar y sacar una muy buena producción de arroz producto de consumo básico en la población.
texts.en: Teresa lives in the community of Maniadero.  She is a widow with 8 grown children who have all finished secondary school.  When she was young she raised pigs and chickens, which is an activity traditionally taught to country women, while doing the household chores and caring for her children.  It was in fact one of her children who suggested to Teresa that she plant rice, and this is how she was introduced to this acticvity.  She had to sell 2 cows to raise the capital for this activity.  However, her children have been a great help with seeding, and she sells her harvest in the district where the sale of her product is thought to be more secure.  She plans to open a well-stocked grocery store, because in her district there are few grocery stores and they do not have the products necessary for the people in the district.   She would also like to make improvements to her humble home.  She will use the loan to pay the rent on 1.75 acres of land to plant rice.  This will help her to create the optimum conditions for growing and harvesting a good rice crop, a basic staple for the population.

loans.use: to pay the rent on  1.75 acres of land and plant rice.

loans.name: Maria Carlina

texts.es:
María es una mujer de 35 años casada con Luis, un albañil de 36 años con quien tiene 2 hijos. Juntos viven en Cuctulahua, una parroquia rural del cantón Mejía ubicado en la Provincia de Pichincha donde también se encuentra la capital del Ecuador. Esta parroquia es conocida por sus coloridas fiestas y tradicionales desfiles donde participan sus habitantes.
María trabaja vendiendo animales desde hace 5 años, esta actividad le ayuda a contribuir económicamente a su hogar y a solventar sus necesidades diarias. Básicamente su negocio es comprar animales a las personas que se dedican a criarlos y venderlos a mayor precio en los mercados de su parroquia. El financiamiento ha sido un obstáculo para esta emprendedora, sin embargo ha encontrado en Fundación Alternativa la solución que esperaba para poder crecer realizando inversiones mediante créditos, de esta manera podrá comprar animales en efectivo con lo que podrá solicitar un mejor precio y con ello tener mejores ingresos.
Su sueño es terminar su casa, y luego arreglarla para vivir junto a su familia y mejorar su estilo de vida.
texts.en: María is 35 and is married to Luis, a brick layer, who is 36.  They have 2 children.  They live in Cuctulahua, a rural parish in the canton of Mejía in the province of Pichincha, where the capital of Ecuador is also located.  This parish is known for its colorful festivals and traditional parades in which the townspeople participate.  María has worked selling animals for 5 years.  This work helps her contribute economically to her home and pay for their daily needs.  Her business is buying animals from people who raise them and selling them at a higher price in the markets in her parish.  Financing has been an obstacle for this entrepreneur; however, she has found the solution she was hoping for in Fundación Alternativa to grow and make investments through loans.  In this way, she will be able to buy animals with cash so she can request a better prices and therefore have better income.  Her dream is to finish her home and then repair it so she can live with her family in better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy animals.

loans.name: Gladys Del Carmen

texts.es: Gladys Del Carmen casada, con  38 años de edad, tiene dos hijos menores de edad, tiene por  actividad económica  venta de repostería. Hace más de 20  años que tiene este negocio, pues con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado obtenerlo. Ella es una mujer que ha luchado por salir adelante pues siempre está pendiente de generar ingresos a su hogar.  El motivo del financiamiento es para la compra de materia prima como queso, mantequilla, azúcar, cazuelejas  entre otras cosas.
texts.en: Gladys Del Carmen is married and 38.  She has two young children and makes a living by selling baked goods.  She has had this business for more than 20 years, and she obtained it through a lot of effort.  She is a woman who has fought to get ahead and she is always committed to generating income for her home.  She will use the financing to buy supplies like cheese, butter, sugar, cookware, etc.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as cheese, butter, sugar, cookware, etc.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
La socia Francisca sigue perteneciendo al banco comunal "Mujeres Unidas" y ella sigue dedicándose en el negocio de la panadería y sigue elaborando ricas tortas, panes, pasteles entre otros productos como maicillos, condesas y otros. 

La socia Francisca en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar sacos de harina al por mayor, manteca, mantequilla, levadura para elaborar y preparar los diferentes pasteles. 

La socia Francisca en general agradece la oportunidad brindada y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus diferentes cuotas en los plazos establecidos.
texts.en:
Francisca is a member who continues to participate in the Communal Bank "Mujeres Unidas" (United Women). She continues to engage in her bakery business and produces delicious cakes, breads, pastries, and products such as corn starch cookies, "condesas" (another type of cookie), and other items.

Francisca is taking this opportunity to request a loan to buy sacks of flour in bulk, lard, butter, and yeast for making and preparing different pastries. She is grateful for the opportunity provided and promises to complete her various payments according to the established terms.

loans.use: to buy sacks of flour in bulk, lard, butter, and yeast.

loans.name: Laguna Azul Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “LAGUNA AZUL” iniciará el ciclo segundo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Villa Tejada, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Norma es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de carne, compra de herramientas para instalación de gas, venta de verduras, venta de productos varios, cultivo y venta de verduras, venta de coca y verduras.

La señora Norma, indica que hace ocho meses que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de su hija. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de ropa americana, este negocio lo desarrolla hace años instalando el mismo por iniciativa propia.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de ropa americana), que comprará de las de la Cuidad de Oruro y posteriormente lo comercializará en su puesto fijo. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella es divorciada y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta que le otorguen el préstamo y que conozca más personas.

En la fotografía no se encuentra la señora Isabel, pues se encontraba en consulta médica
texts.en:
The “DIVINAS” community association will begin its second cycle with Pro Mujer, as part of the central office in Villa Tejada.  It’s made up of eight members and is directed by a board of directors, where Norma is the President.   The other members of the association run various other businesses.  We have meat sales, buying tools to install gas, vegetable sales, various product sales, raising and selling vegetables, coca and vegetable sales.

Norma says that she has been with Pro Mujer for eight months, having joined after being invited by her daughter.  She currently has an American clothing business.  She developed this business years ago through her own initiative. 

She will use the money from this loan to increase her working capital (buy American clothing) and she will buy from the city of Oruro and then resell from her point of sale.  This type of work will allow her to generate income to support her family.  She is divorced and has three children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she says that she likes that the provide loans and allow her to meet other people.

Isabel is missing in the picture.  She had gone to the doctor.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Doris Tatiana

texts.es: Doris Tatiana tiene esta emprendedora tiene por actividad económica una pequeña pulpería ubicada en su casa de habitación, tiene 35 años de edad, es madre soltera y tiene  3 hijos. Esta no es la primera vez que solicita créditos por lo que se siente muy agradecida con este medio de vida ya que de él obtiene sus ingresos y  la estabilidad económica de sus familia  el crédito lo utilizara para comprar  productos de consumo diario como:  granos básicos, golosinas, refrescos naturales y pan, huevos, tiste, hielos, condimentos, verduras, entre otros.
texts.en: Doris Tatiana is enterprising, and has a small grocery store located in her own house.  She is 35 years old and is a single mother with 3 children.  This is not the first time that she has requested a loan, and she is therefore grateful for this means of obtaining income and creating economic stability for her family.  She will use the loan to buy basic products for daily consumption such as: basic grains, sweets, natural soft drinks and bread, ice, condiments and vegetables, among other things.

loans.use: to buy: basic products for daily consumption: basic grains, sweets, natural soft drinks and bread, eggs, ice, condiments and vegetables, among other things.

loans.name: Nora Del Socorro

texts.es: Nora, habitante de la comunidad San Lorenzo, en las afueras de Teustepe, Boaco, es madres de dos hijos los cuales están en la secundaria. Ella solo logro estudiar la primaria debido a la situación de pobreza en la que creció. Además de ser ama de casa es agricultora. Su actividad la inicio hace 5 años con la ayuda de sus hijos y su esposo el cual se dedica a la agricultura también. Comenzó sembrando 1 manzana de arroz cerca de su casa, esta ha sido su primer negocio, lo que saca de la producción lo vende en su comunidad donde llegan los compradores a buscar su cultivo de arroz. Esto representa un esfuerzo muy grande del cual se siente muy orgullosa ya pocas mujeres realizan esta actividad además de generar ingresos para su hogar, para ella su principal inspiración son sus hijos por los cuales ella lucha por salir adelante. La época de lluvia están próximas por eso ella quiere sembrar antes de que comience el invierno por este motivo, está solicitando el crédito Kiva para comprar insumos, pagar mano de obra para sembrar 1.5 manzana de arroz. Este crédito le ayudara a tener mejor producción para sacar a tiempo sus cosechas y venderlas a tiempo y tratar de sembrar más en la próxima temporada. Sus planes futuros son comprar 2 manzanas de tierras ya que actualmente solo posee 1.5manzana.
texts.en: Nora lives in the community of San Lorenza in the outskirts of Teustepe, Boaco.  She is the mother of two children who are in secondary school.  She only studied through elementary school due to the impoverished conditions in which she grew up.  In addition to being a housewife, she is also a farmer.  She started this work five years ago with the help of her children and her husband, who also works in agriculture.  She started planting one "manzana" [a unit of land equivalent to 1.7 acres] of rice near her home.  This is her first loan.  She sells what she produces in the community where buyers come looking for her rice crop.  This represents a great effort, of which she is very proud because few women do this work to generate income for their homes.  Her main inspiration are her children, for whom she fights to take good care of them.  The rainy season is getting close, so she wants to harvest before it begins.  She is requesting the Kiva loan to buy supplies and to pay for labor to harvest 1.5 "manzanas" [2.5 acres] of rice.  This loan will help her have better production and to harvest her crop and sell it in time so she can try to plant more next season.  Her future plans are to buy 2 "manzanas" [3.5 acres] of land since she currently only has 1.5 "manzanas".

loans.use: to buy supplies and to pay for labor to harvest 1.5 "manzanas" [2.5 acres] of rice.

loans.name: Rosa Genoveva

texts.es: La señora Rosa Genoveva tiene su negocio que el destace de cerdo y res, Ella aduce que en su negocio siempre vende diario, y gracias a esto su nivel de vida ha mejorado pero siempre está buscando la forma de mejorar sus ingresos. La señora Rosa solicita este préstamo para invertirle a su negocio que consiste en la venta carne variedad ya que la mayoría de sus clientes llegan a comprar. Generalmente viaja algunas veces distribuye sus productos a clientes que tienen mucho tiempo de trabajar con ella.
texts.en: Rosa Genoveva sells pork and beef.  She says that she sells every day and thanks to this her quality of life has improved, but she is always looking for a way to improve her income.  Rosa is asking for this loan to invest into her business because most of her customers go to shop.  She generally travels sometimes to deliver her products to her customers who have been working with her for a long time..

loans.use: to buy cattle and pigs.

loans.name: Deysi Eugenia

texts.es:
Deysi es una joven de 22 años de edad, muy trabajadora y entusiasta, su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Imperial, la cual se caracteriza por su clima cálido y acogedor, también tiene playas hermosas y se desarrolla la agricultura, en especial el cultivo de algodón, maíz, frejoles, entre otros.  Deysi tiene 3 hermanas menores, a las cuales apoya mucho con su trabajo y también gracias a sus ingresos sigue estudiando la carrera de Hotelería y Turismo. 

Con mucho esfuerzo y ahorro Deysi tiene su negocio de alquiler de local para fiestas, matrimonios,  cumpleaños, entre otros, en especial los fines de semana, también ofrece sus servicios de decoraciones para fiestas, es muy creativa y por eso ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy creativa para sus decoraciones y también porque ofrece un buen servicio y amabilidad a los clientes.

Deysi está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mesas y sillas para su negocio ya que también empezara a ofrecer la comida y no tiene donde se puedan sentar los clientes, así de esta manera ella podrá seguir creciendo y luchando cada día para hacer realidad su más grande sueño.” Darle una profesión a sus hermanas y poder tener un restaurante muy grande”.
texts.en:
Deysi is a young, 22-year-old woman who is very hard-working and enthusiastic.  Her home is located in the city of Imperial, which is known for its hot climate.  It also has beautiful beaches and an agricultural industry, especially cotton, corn, beans, and other crops.  Deysi has 3 younger sisters, whom she supports a lot with her work.  Also, thanks to her income, she continues studying for a career in Hotels and Tourism.

With a lot of effort and savings, Deysi has a business of renting out a location for parties, weddings, birthdays, etc., especially on weekends.  She also decorates for parties.  She is very creative, and she thinks this is why her business is going well.  She also offers good and friendly service.

Deysi is very thanful to the Kiva lenders since thanks to the help they have offered her, she will be able to buy tables and chairs for her business since she will also start to offer food and she doesn't have a place for her customers to sit down.  In this way, she will be able to continue growing and fighting every day to make her biggest dream a reality:  "to give her sisters a job and to have a very big restaurant."

loans.use: to buy tables and chairs.

loans.name: Elsa Iris

texts.es: Elsa es originaria de esta ciudad y desde los 15 años a estudiado el oficio de estilista por lo cual, a su corte edad ya tiene  su negocio propio y es de donde obtiene sus ingresos para mantener su casa y carrera profesional, además de su negocio. Ella siempre ha tenido el apoyo de su familia aun cuando no viven con ella, el propósito de la señorita Elsa es lograr terminar su carrera y colocar varias sucursales de su negocio.  Desea ampliar y remodelar su negocio, ya que le ayudara atraer mas clientes y bridar un mejor servicios, el lugar en donde esta establecido su negocio, esta acondicionado como casa habitación y necesita realizar algunos ajustes para brindar un mejor aspecto.
texts.en: Elsa comes from this city, and has studied the business of being a stylist for 15 years.  This is why she had her own business at such a young age.  This is how she obtains the income to provide for her household and for her professional training, in addition to her business.  She has always had the support of her family, and when they no longer live with her, her plan is to finish her studies and to establish various business locations.   She would like to expand and remodel her business, as this will help her to attract more clients and provide better service. The place where she has established her business was set up as a residence, and therefore needs some changes to create a better appearance.

loans.use: to remodel her business.

loans.name: Gregorio

texts.es:
El sr. Gregorio vive con su esposa y entre los dos atienden un negocio de abarrotes y otro en el cual  trabaja como vendedor de muebles con ello sostienen sus gatos personales y surten su tienda.
El comenta que su casa es pequeña y quiere remodelar la recamara para brindarse mejor estancia y descanso así como comprar una cama nueva, sabanas, peinador, pintarla, etc.
texts.en: Gregorio lives with his wife, and between the two of them, they attend to a grocery store and a furniture sales business.  This is how he pays for their expenses and stocks their store.  He says that their house is small, and he wants to remodel the bedroom to have more room and to buy a new bed, sheets, a dresser, and to paint the room, etc.

loans.use: to remodel a bedroom.

loans.name: Nicolas Alonso

texts.es: Nicolás de 59 años, casado siempre se ha demostrado  ser un  hombre trabajador que tiene un negocio de servicio de reparación de bicicletas. Comenzó su negocio hace once  años cuando él se jubilo, pues siempre ha sido un hombre activo y necesitaba una actividad para mantenerse ocupado es por eso que decide establecerse con este negocio. Poco a poco con esfuerzo y dedicación pudo mejorar su local de trabajo. Este crédito es para la compra de llantas, asientos, calcomanías, cadenas, grasa, desarmadores, tornillos bomba de aire entre otros.
texts.en: Nicolás is 59 years and married. He has always been a hard-working man who has a business repairing bicycles.  He started this business 11 years ago when he retired, as he has always been an active man and he needed an activity to keep him occupied.  For this reason he decided to start this business.  Little by little, with effort and dedication, he was able to improve his workplace.  This loan is to buy tires, seats, decals, chains, oil, screwdrivers, and screws for air pumps, among other things.

loans.use: to buy tires, seats, decals, chains, oil, screwdrivers and  screws for air pumps, among other things.

loans.name: Luz Maria

texts.es:
Luz, tiene 35 años de edad, vive con su esposo y sus seis hijos, los cuales están estudiando y son menores de edad, ella se dedica a la venta de medicina natural y química, tambien venta de productos de primera necesidad, tiene cinco años en el negocio lo aprendió de sus padres y trabaja de lunes a sábado.
Está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de vitaminas, productos medicinales, suplementos alimenticios, y otro producto más que sean de origen natural y químico ya que muchos clientes tienen mayor inclinación en la elaboración de ciertos productos, esta compra ayudará a incrementar su inventario.
El objetivo de ella con el préstamo es fortalecer el negocio ofreciéndole una mejor calidad a los clientes en productos nuevos y esto le permitirá mantener su preferencia de la misma manera generar mejores ingresos a su familia.
texts.en:
Luz is 35 years old and lives with her husband and six school age children. She sells medicine and natural remedies as well as staple household foods.  She has been working in this business for five years which she learned from her parents.  She works Monday through Saturday. 

She is requesting the loan to buy vitamins, medicines, food supplements and other products that medicinal or natural remedy applications.  Many customers are inclined to mix their own food supplements so she would like to expand her inventory.  

The purpose of the loan is to strengthen the business by offering new and better quality products to her customers, through this she can remain their preferred vendor and allow her to earn more to support her family.

loans.use: to buy vitamins, medicine and food supplements.

loans.name: Ma Magdalena

texts.es:
El hijo de la sra. Magdalena ya es un adolecente por lo cual desea que tenga su propio espacio ya que ella vive en una casa de interés social y el espacio es muy reducido, el préstamo para ella tiene unos grandes beneficios ya que con este comenzara ha lograr darle una comodidad y privacidad a su hijo con la construcción de un cuarto para él.
La sra. trabaja desde hace 11 años en una guardería, su situación ha sido difícil pero aun  ha logrado sacar adelante su casa, y a su hijo, ahora su propósito es ver ha su hijo realizado como persona profesional, al igual que dejar un patrimonio para su estabilidad ya que solo se tienen uno al otro.
texts.en:
Magdalena's son is already an teenager and wants his own space.  She lives in a communal home and space is very limited. The loan she has taken has had some great benefits: with the construction of his own room, her son has experienced comfort and privacy.

Magdalena has been working 11 years in a nursery.  Her situation has been difficult but she has still been able to improve her home and help her son.  Now her goal is to see her son become a professional, leaving a heritage for stability since they only have each other.

loans.use: to build the foundation for the construction of a bedroom.

loans.name: Jose Maria

texts.es:
José, se dedica a la venta de cocos al menudeo, vive con su esposa y sus hijos, el negocio lo aprendido por cuenta propia ya tiene varios años, aproximadamente siete de realizar este negocio, el cual le ha permitido obtener los recursos para las necesidades de su hogar.
El solicita un préstamo para la compra de una cantidad de cocos los cuales pondrá a la venta, esto le ayudará a mejorar su inventario y el poder atender mejor la demanda, esperando que en esta época  aumente la afluencia de clientes.
El objetivo de José es mejorar las instalaciones de su vivienda para que su familia tenga un lugar mejor, también aspira tener un local propio donde puede realizar la venta de cocos.
texts.en:
José is a coconut retailer. He lives with his wife and children. José has been in this business for approximately seven years and learned the trade on his own. This has enabled him to generate income for his household needs.

José is requesting a loan in order to buy a quantity of coconuts that he can sell. This will help improve his inventory so that he can better satisfy the demand. He hopes this season to increase with an abundance of customers. José's goal is to improve the facilities in his home so that his family will have a better place in which to live. He also aspires to have his own shop where he can sell coconuts.

loans.use: to buy coconuts.

loans.name: Filio

texts.es:
Filio tiene 28 años, es un joven laborioso y muy activo. Vive solo en la casa que llegó a comprar gracias a su arduo trabajo, la construyó a base de madera.
Desde que se independizó de sus padres empezó a laborar como jornalero en los campos de cultivo de sus vecinos. Pero gracias a su empeño pudo comprarse un terreno en el que ahora cultiva café, pues la producción de este grano es muy rentable. Al igual que todos sus vecinos, en las temporadas de cosecha cuenta con ayuda de peones para extraer fácilmente los frutos. Para más adelante. Filio desea en comprar un terreno más grande y en ella seguir plantado café. Por lo que ahora prioriza en mantener fértil sus tierras, y ya se acerca la cosecha, donde estará muy ocupado. 

Este es su primer crédito con MFP, por lo que se siente muy agradecido por la confianza que le brindan. Asimismo, se compromete a ser puntual en sus cuotas de pago, ya que no quiere quedar mal con su banco comunal. 
Con el préstamo obtenido contratará peones para que le ayuden en su cosecha de café.
texts.en:
Filio is 28, young, industrious and very active.  He lives alone in the house he was able to buy through hard work.  It is built of wood.

Since he became independent of his parents, he began to work in his neighbors' fields as a laborer.  Thanks to his efforts, he was able to buy land on which he now grows coffee, since it is very profitable.  Like all of his neighbors, he contracts laborers to harvest crops.  Filio wants to buy a larger piece of land and continue planting coffee on it.  Currently he gives priority to keeping his land fertile.  The harvest is also approaching, which will keep him very busy.

This is his first loan with Microfinanzas Prisma, and he is very grateful for the confidence they have in him.  He agrees to be punctual with his payments because he doesn't want to be on bad terms with his communal bank.  

With this loan, he will hire laborers to help him harvest coffee.

loans.use: to hire laborers to help him harvest coffee.

loans.name: Him

texts.en: Him is 44 years old. She is the mother of four children and resides with her husband in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She has been selling firewood for more than ten years, earning approximately $3 per day. Her husband is employed in APSARA Preservation Unit. He earns about $2 per day. Two of her children are employed. They earn about $7 per day. Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Him is requesting a loan of $1000 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase would enable her to use the saved money on her transportation expenses to support the family. In the future, she would like to run a grocery store at home and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a new computer and better-quality printer

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy ten sacks of manure, six bags of sulfates, and 2000 chili plants.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase materials for upcoming projects through Veterans Affairs

loans.name: Savat

texts.en:
Savat (pictured here) is now a garment worker. Her husband, Chea, is a driver. He drives for a company. They live in a suburb of Phnom Penh and have one young son. 

Savat’s husband would like to stop working as a driver in order to become a Tuk Tuk taxi driver. Hence, Savat would like to request another loan of $700 to add to her own money to buy a Tuk Tuk for her husband.

loans.use: To buy a Tuk Tuk for her husband.

loans.name: Ramona Elizabeth

texts.es: Ramona tiene 35 años de edad, soltera, vive en una colonia suburbana de San Pedro Sula junto con sus padres. Ella anteriormente prestaba sus servicios de decoraciones para eventos especiales y se dedicaba al estudio.  Hace 7 años que Ramona recibió de parte de su madre el negocio de venta de verduras y frutas para que se independizara y lo administrara. Los productos que vende son: tomates, chiles, cebollas, papas, brócoli, limones,  y frutas de temporada. Le ha ido muy bien con el negocio ya que lo mantiene surtido y brinda buena atención a sus clientes. Actualmente solicita un préstamo de 20,000.00 Lempiras para comprar verduras y frutas y tener siempre producto fresco que ofrecer a sus clientes. Su plan es ampliar su negocio para que le genere ingresos que mejoren la economía familiar.
texts.en:
Ramona is 35 years old, single, and lives with her parents in a suburban neighborhood of San Pedro Sula. She previously offered decoration services for special events and also dedicated time to her studies. Seven years ago, Ramona received a share of her mother's vegetable and fruit business. She decided to manage it so that she could become independent. The products she sells include tomatoes, chili peppers, onions, potatoes, broccoli, limes, and seasonal fruits. Ramona has done very well in her business and wants to maintain her inventory so that she can provide good service to her customers.

She is currently requesting a loan of 20,000 HNL in order to buy vegetables and fruits so that she will always have fresh products to offer to her customers. Her plan is to expand her business so that she can generate income to improve her family's finances.

loans.use: to buy vegetables and fruits.

loans.name: Khon's Group

texts.en: Khon is 37 years old and married with five children, four of whom are students. The main sources of income for her family are rice farming and cassava planting. They have been in these businesses for 15 years. The main constraint for their business is the drop in price of cassava. Khon has been with VisionFund for three loan cycles and the other member of the group has been with VisionFund for one loan cycle. After completely paying their previous obligations, they are now requesting another loan. Khon, as a leader, will use her portion to buy fertilizers for her crops and seedlings. She really hopes this loan will enable her to increase her crop yield and sell those crops for a good price.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and seedlings

loans.name: Shirley Del Rosario

texts.es: Shirley Del Rosario, casada, tiene 30 años, con hijos menores de edad se dedica a la venta de alimentos para animales. Hace más de 8 años que tiene este negocio. Es una persona muy conocida en su negocio pues siempre está al pendiente de lo que sus clientes le solicitan para no perderlos. Siempre se caracteriza por brindar un buen servicio. Ella solicita este crédito para aprovechar esta temporada lluviosa y comprar concentrado, maíz, trigo, sorgo pedigrí, entre otros. Sueña con establecer un negocio y vender al por mayor.
texts.en: Shirley del Rosario is 30, married, and has children at home. She has had a business selling animal feed for over 8 years. She is well known in her business because she is always aware of what her customers need so that she doesn’t lose sales. She is known for the good service she offers her customers. She is requesting the loan in order to take advantage of the rainy season and purchase animal feed, corn, wheat, hybrid sorghum, among other goods. Her dream is to establish a wholesale business.

loans.use: Purchase animal feed, corn, wheat, hybrid sorghum, among other goods.

loans.name: Ramon Emilse

texts.es: Ramón, habitante de Diriomo un municipio de Granada, se dedica a la fabricación y venta de Ladrillos, es casado, sus hijos son mayores de edad, son independientes. El empezó su negocio con ayuda de su suegro el cual le dio material y un lugar donde exhibir sus productos. Actualmente tanto Ramón como su esposa trabaja para sacar a su familia adelante, ella es vendedora de abarrotes y el vende y hace ladrillos. Productos que vende en su casa de habitación. Antes el trabajaba para un fabrica donde la paga era semanal pero decidió poner su propio negocio para buscar una mejor manera de generar más ingresos. Sus clientes llegan  hasta su casa en busca  de ladrillos los cuales son fabricados de muy buena calidad. El solicita el crédito para comprar materia prima para elaborar ladrillos. Este crédito la ayudara a conseguir más materia prima y poder cumplir a tiempo los pedidos que le hace, el lugar donde el exhibe sus productos es de su suegro pero el tiene como
texts.en:
Ramón, an inhabitant of Diriomo, a municipality of Granada, makes his living producing and selling bricks. He is married; his children are adults and independent.

He started his business with the help of his father-in-law who gave him the material and a place to exhibit his products. Currently, both Ramón and his wife work to get their family ahead - she is a grocery store vendor and he makes and sells bricks, products which he sells in his home.

Before Ramón used to work for a factory where he was paid on a weekly basis, but he decided to set up his own business to find a better way of generating more income. His customers come to his home for bricks, which are produced at a very high quality. He seeks this loan to buy the raw materials to make bricks. This loan will help him to obtain more raw materials and be able to complete the orders placed with him on time, while the place where he exhibits his products belongs to his father-in-law, he treats it as if he were the owner.

loans.use: to buy raw materials to make bricks.

loans.name: Chanthon

texts.en:
Chanthon (in the photo), age 33, is a primary school teacher. Her husband, Toeurn, age 38, is a tour guide. She has been married since 2007 and just has one son who is in grade 2. IN addition, she has one sister living with her. The family lives in a suburb of Phnom Penh. 

Chanthon is applying for her first loan of $1,000 to purchase a motorbike to drive to teach.

loans.use: To purchase a motorbike

loans.name: Lang Eng

texts.en:
Lang Eng (pictured above) is 45 years old and her husband, Samnang, is 43 years old. They have been married since 1992 and they have two sons. The oldest son is a garment worker and the youngest is in school. The family lives 25 kilometers from Phnom Penh City.
  
Lang Eng sells grocery items at home, while her husband is a motor taxi driver. She took a prior Kiva loan to buy a motorcycle for her oldest son to get to work. 

Lang Eng is now asking for another loan of $700 to purchase another motorbike so her youngest son can drive to school.

loans.use: To buy a motorbike for her youngest son to drive to school.

loans.name: Roeurng

texts.en: Roeurng is 54 years old. She is married and blessed with a son in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She has been running a food store for more than 10 years, earning approximately $3 per day. Her husband is a rice farmer who earns about $2 per day. Her son is a motor mechanic. He earns about $3 per day. In order to improve her family’s finances, Roeurng is requesting a loan of $500 to raise capital in her business to purchase more ingredients and utensils to use in her store. This money will help her expand her business and earn more income to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and build a new kitchen to provide hygienic living conditions for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more ingredients and utensils

loans.name: Sreyneang's Group

texts.en: Sreyneang and her family live in a wooden house with a zinc roof located in a rural area of Kampong Cham province. She and her family have been planting cassava to support their two children for six years. Sreyneang and her group member have been with VisionFund for four loan cycles and they are now requesting another loan after paying back their fourth loan. As a leader, Sreyneang will use her portion of the loan to spend on farmland preparations and to hire others to clean grasses in her plantation. With this loan, Sreyneang hopes to grow a good yield of crops and sell them for a higher price so that she has enough money to get a proper house for the family.

loans.use: To pay for land preparations and labor fees

loans.name: Asy

texts.en:
Asy (in the photo) is 30 years old and her husband, Rasaly, is 35 years old. They live in a village about 20 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. They have been married since 1999 and they have four children: three sons and one daughter. Two of the children attend school and the other two are still young. 

Asy and her husband are fishermen. They sell fish that they catch in the local market. Asy’s family is Cham Muslim. The Cham are an ethnic minority in Cambodia. They live in a village about 20 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. 

Asy is applying for her first loan of $800 to repair her boat and buy a new boat motor because they are old and they break.

loans.use: To repair her boat and buy a new boat motor.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is 25 years old, married, and has one child. She runs a hardware business to earn a living. She has been in the business for two years and has employed one person. She has grown her business since she joined Faulu Kenya because she has been trained in business management skills.  

She hopes to grow her business and employ people. She has requested 20,000 Kenya shillings to buy cement, paint and nails.

loans.use: To buy cement, paint and nails.

loans.name: Michelle

texts.en: Michelle is married with 3 children. She is 26 years old and lives in Panta-on, Ozamis City, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. Michelle owns and operates a plot of farmland, planting bananas to earn a living. She has been in this business for 6 years and earns PHP 4,000 each month. She requested a loan of PHP 4,500 to purchase farm chemicals. Michelle has been a member of Kiva's partner, GDMPC, for a year. In the future, Michelle's plan is to save her returns in order to buy a car.

loans.use: to purchase farm chemicals.

loans.name: Marijen

texts.en:
Marijen runs a fishing business with her husband. She lives in Dauis, Bohol with her family. She has 5 children, the oldest of whom is 8 years old.

Marijen sells her husband's catch to their community. She also buys more fish that she sells at a profit. Marijen works hard to help provide for her family's basic needs and send her children to school. She requested a loan to purchase a boat engine. She hopes to find an additional source of income in the future.

loans.use: to purchase a boat engine

loans.name: Edwin Jesús

texts.es: Desde muy niño Edwin aprendió el arte de la culinaria al ser criado por su abuela quien por mucho tiempo tuvo restaurante y a quien siempre le colaboraba en el mismo.  Hace aproximadamente 10 años, trabajó como cocinero en un restaurante del municipio, donde perfeccionó sus conocimientos y sus habilidades que lo llevaron a considerar abrir su propio negocio e independizarse. Fue así como creó el Restaurante “Donde Edwin”, utilizando inicialmente los utensilios de cocina de su madre ya que contaba con pocos recursos pero poco a poco fue comprando sus ollas, calderos y demás enseres para la producción, además de ir adquiriendo una clientela que ha ido creciendo a través de los años. A algunos de sus clientes les ofrece créditos quincenales para el pago de la comida, es por esto que necesita tener un capital de trabajo disponible que le permita comprar los insumos al por mayor para obtener descuentos y así poder seguir atendiendo su demanda.  A pesar de que Edwin tiene competencia muy cerca, esto no representa amenaza para el ya que su éxito lo atribuye a su sazón casera en los platos, donde utiliza principalmente muchas verduras frescas.  La especialidad de la casa es el pescado frito acompañado de arroz con coco, patacones, ensalada de aguacate y agua de panela, plato típico de la región costera donde se encuentra ubicado, muy cerca del mar.  Está aspirando a su segundo crédito con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, siente que ha sido de gran utilidad para su negocio por ser una buena fuente de recursos.  Su mayor sueño es trasladar algún día el restaurante a un local para independizarlo de la vivienda y así brindarle mayor comodidad a su clientela y a su familia.
texts.en:
From a tender age, Edwin learned the art of cooking having been brought up by his grandmother who had a restaurant for a long time, and who he always helped with it. Roughly 10 years ago, he worked as a chef at a restaurant in the municipality where he honed his knowledge and abilities which led him to consider opening his own business and to become independent.

That was how he came about setting up the restaurant “Donde Edwin”, initially he used his mother's cooking utensils as he had little resources but little by little he bought his pots, cookers and other equipment for production, moreover, he acquires a customer base which has been growing over the years. He gives some of his customers a layaway plan (payments every two weeks) to pay for the meals that is why he needs an available working capital which enables him to buy the suppliers in bulk to obtain discounts and in that way continue to meet the demand. Despite the fact that Edwin has competition nearby, this does not represent a threat for him as he attributes his success to the homely taste in his dishes, where he uses mainly a lot of fresh fruit and vegetables. The house specialty is fried fish accompanied by coconut rice, avocado salad and agua de panela [sugarcane water], typical dish in the coastal region in which it is located, very close to the sea. 

He is seeking his second loan from the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. He feels that it has been extremely useful for his business as an excellent source of income. His great dream is to one day move the restaurant to premises to separate it from the home and make his customers and his family more comfortable.

loans.use: to buy the supplies and food in bulk to produce the dishes that he sells.

loans.name: Walter Oswaldo

texts.es:
Walter, es un agricultor, tiene 20 años, vive con sus padres, está soltero, él aprendió a los 15 años el trabajo agrícola junto con su padre desde hace cinco años está dedicado por completo, con el objetivo de obtener ingresos para apoyar a su familia y para cubrirse su propia necesidad.
Él solicita un préstamo porque está iniciando la siembra de Chile para esto deberá comprarse 1000 plantas, abonos, foliares, que son necesarios para aplicarlos al cultivo ayudándole mejorar y a fortalecer la plantación.
El objetivo de Walter es aumentar su nivel económico a través de una buena cosecha, para tener una mejor condición y apoyar a sus padres en las necesidades básicas.
texts.en:
Walter is a farmer, he is 20 years old, single and lives with his parents. At the age of 15, he learned the ropes of the agricultural trade and along with his father for five years now he has worked full-time, all with the aim of generating an income to support his family and meet his own needs.

He requests a loan because he is starting to sow chilies, for which he needs to buy 1,000 plants, fertilizers and plant fertilizers absorbed through the leaves which need to be applied to the crops helping him to improve and strengthen the crop.

Walter's aim is to improve his economic situation with a good harvest, to have a better standard of living and support his parents in their basic needs.

loans.use: to buy 1,000 chili plants and different types of fertilizers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy bananas, cabbage, oil, corn and snacks.

loans.name: Sarath

texts.en:
Sarath, 30, is single, living with his old mother in a village of the Kandal Stoeng district of Cambodia. He earns a living through transporting rice and other items for a fee and farming rice. He supplements his income by planting morning glory as additional income. 

Sarath is a second cycle client with Kiva's partner, VisionFund and he completely paid back the first loan, which has helped him better support his relative to study in grade 12 and his living. The current business earns him around 120,000 KHR per day and he is able to save around 40,000 KHR each day for future needs. With clear planning, he is applying for a loan to purchase another plot of farmland so as to increase his rice farming business. He hopes this loan will enable him to prosper his business and earn a larger income so as to support his relative to go to higher education and save some money for his wedding in the future.

loans.use: To purchase another plot of farmland

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise such as shoes, clothes and perfume for sale.

loans.name: Andrea De Fatima

texts.es:
Andrea es de la comunidad las canoas Tipitapa casada tiene 3 hijos de 18, 14 y 3 años de edad, de los cuales solo él hijo de 14 años estudia la primaria. 
Andrea  tiene una pulpería también hace tortillas y cuajadas (queso) para vender ella empezó su negocio hace 3 años con dinero que obtuvo de la liquidación que le dieron en el trabajo que tenía anteriormente en un centro de hogar de niños. En el negocio de Andrea  le ayuda su hermana  y todo lo que realiza lo vende en su casa donde vienen los clientes a comprar, Andrea también recibe otros ingresos  ya que el marido trabaja como operador de maquina en minas. Andrea hoy solicita este crédito  para surtir la pulpería comprando arroz , frijol ,maíz y otros productos varios ella dice que este crédito será de ayuda ya que al surtir mas la venta tendrá mas ganancias  también dice que una vez que cancele este crédito sacara otro crédito para invertir en la venta y expandirse mas.
texts.en: Andrea is from the community of Las Canoas Tipitapa. She is married with three children who are 18, 14, and 3 years old. Only the 14 year old is in school. Andrea has a grocery store and also makes tortillas and cheese curds to sell. She began her business 3 years ago with money she received when she was made unemployed from her previous job in a childcare center. Andrea's sister helps her with the business and she sells everything from her house where the customers go to buy things. Andrea also receives other income as her husband works as a machine operator in mines. Today, Andrea is requesting this loan to supply her grocery store by buying rice, beans, corn, and other products. She says that this loan will help her to restock and have greater profits. She also says that, once she has paid off this loan, she will take out another loan to invest in sales and expanding more.

loans.use: to supply her grocery store by buying rice, beans, corn, and other products.

loans.name: Ana Dolores

texts.es:
Ana, vive con su esposo y sus nietos, la vivienda es propia administra un molino y la venta de tortillas, desde hace 10 años está en el negocio, del cual ha podido ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar.
Esta solicitando préstamos para la reparación del molino, comprándose algunos puestos ya que está presentando desperfectos para el momento de prestar el servicio, este crédito le ayudará a superar este problema y poder continuar brindando un excelente servicio a los clientes.
El objetivo de Ana es ganarse más clientes potenciales, crecer en el negocio, y ver por las necesidades en su familia.
texts.en:
Ana lives with her husband and her grandchildren in their own home. She runs a mill and sells tortillas and has been doing this for 10 years, and this has enabled her to help her husband with the household expenses. 
She is requesting loans to repair the mill and buy some parts as, at the moment, it has some damage that affects her service. This loan will help her to overcome this problem and to continue offering excellent service to her customers. 
Ana's goals are to gain more customers, grow the business, and see to her family's needs.

loans.use: to repair her mill.

loans.name: Rene Enrique

texts.es:
René, es un agricultor tiene 28 años de edad, está casado y es padre de un niño de un año de edad, viven en casa propia, él aprendió el trabajo agrícola con su padre desde muy pequeño, tiene cinco años de estar trabajando para su familia, hasta el momento no ha tenido ningún inconveniente en la realización del cultivo.
El solicita un préstamo para la compra de materiales agrícolas, pues está sembrando nuevamente el maíz y Chile para esto necesita seis sacos de abono una bolsa de herbicidas, semilla de maíz, 2,000 plantas de Chile, con este préstamo tendrá una mejor condición para realizar la siembra con el fin de obtener una mejor cosecha.
El objetivo de René y poder ayudar a su familia con su trabajo, salir adelante con ayuda de estos préstamos y desarrollarse más en la agricultura.
texts.en:
René is a 28 year old farmer. He is married and is the father of a 1 year old son. They live in their own home. He learned the work of farming from his father from a very young age. He has been working for his family for 5 years and, to date, he hasn't had any problems with his crops.
He is requesting the loan to buy agricultural supplies. He is sowing new crops of corn and chili and for this he needs 6 sacks of fertilizer and 1 bag of herbicides, corn seed, and 2,000 chili plants. The loan will give him better conditions for sowing with the goal of having a better harvest. 
René's goal is to help his family through his work, to get ahead with the help of these loans, and to develop more as a farmer.

loans.use: to buy 6 sacks of fertilizer, 1 bag of herbicide, corn seed, and 2,000 chili plants.

loans.name: Mente Positiva Group

texts.es:
El grupo lleva por nombre “Mente Positiva” en homenaje a la oportunidad que les brinda la Fundación Paraguaya; ya que las mismas señoras tendrán nuevas oportunidades para emprender un mejor trabajo, colaborando con los ingreso de su hogar y así brindarle a sus hijos un mejor bienestar.
La presidenta es la Sra. Elvira quien cuenta que siempre trata de incentivar y ayudar a sus amigas a salir adelante, es por ello que ya están en el decimo tercer ciclo del programa. Elvira se dedica a la venta de ropas, y cuenta que le ha sido de mucha ayuda estar en el grupo por la oportunidad que representa.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de prendas de invierno, con las cuales podrá surtirse para cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en:
This group has the name Mente Positiva (Positive Mind) in homage to the opportunity that the Fundación Paraguaya offers them as the women of the group will have new opportunities to undertake better work, to contribute to the household income, and, thus, to offer their children better welfare. 
The president of the group is Elvira who says that she always tries to incentivize and help her friends to get ahead. It is because of this that they are already in their 10th loan cycle with the program. Elvira works selling clothes and she says that it has been a great help to her to be in this group because of the opportunities that it represents. 
She is requesting a loan to buy winter clothing to supply her business and meet the demands of her customers.

loans.use: to buy winter garments to sell.

loans.name: Buenas Group

texts.en:
Julieta is 46 years old and married with three children. She lives in Buenavista, Pagadian City. For the past two years, Julieta has sold canned and dry goods in her store to earn a living. She makes 10,000 PHP each month and has been a member of PMPC for more than four years.

Julieta is reuqesting a 14,900 PHP loan to purchase more stock for her general store. In the future, she hopes to expand her store and make it a convenience store.

loans.use: to purchase stock for her general store

loans.name: Cresencia

texts.en:
Cresencia is 49 years old and married with two children ages five and 19. She lives with her family in Antequera, Bohol, and earns a living raising hogs. Cresencia started her business to help provide for her family's basic needs and sustain her children's education. 

Cresencia is requesting a loan to purchase piglets and feed. In the future, she hopes to expand her small piggery.

loans.use: to purchase piglets and feed

loans.name: Chet

texts.en:
Chet, age 22, is single, living with his parents in a village located in the Sa Ang district. He makes his own living through farming rice and planting cucumbers and he supplements his income by fishing in the village. This business enables him to earn around 50,000 KHR per day to spend for daily expenses, and he is able to save around 16,000 KHR each day. He has been in this business for several years.

This is the first loan for Chet with Kiva's field partner, VisionFund. Now requesting a loan, he will use it to buy a boat with an engine for fishing and use a portion of it to buy fertilizer for his farmland. With this loan, he hopes to grow his business and make a living better.

loans.use: To buy a boat with an engine for fishing and fertilizer for his farmland.

loans.name: Flora

texts.en:
Flora is 46 years old and married. She has six children between 4 and 18 years old. 

She supports her family through raising hogs and selling baskets made of rattan. Flora works hard to sustain her family, especially her children's education. 

She requested a loan to purchase piglets, feed and basket-weaving materials. Flora hopes to be able to save more for her family.

loans.use: to purchase piglets, feed and basket-weaving materials.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter is a 30-year-old married man with three children, living in Kasese, Uganda.

He has been in banking for eight years, and with the savings of his salary he has now been able to set up a stationery shop. He has a personal goal of educating his children to attain master's degrees, and his business plan is to have one of the most efficient stationary stores in Kasese town.

Peter intends to use the loan to buy a photocopying machine.

loans.use: to buy a photocopying machine.

loans.name: Violet

texts.en:
Violet is a 40-year-old single mother of four children, living in Kasese, Uganda.

She has been in a restaurant business for three years, and with the proceeds she has been able to provide for her family.

Her hardships are inadequate capital to purchase foods and high taxes levied on her business. 

Her personal goals are educating her children and buying a car. 

Her business goals are buying land to grow crops and moving the business to a more central location in town.

Violet wants the loan to buy food and drinks to sell.

loans.use: to buy food and drinks to sell.

loans.name: Ezdihar

texts.en:
Ezdihar is a 58-year-old divorced woman who opened in 2007 her own business. Ezdihar is a hard working woman with a very good reputation in her region.

Her store is not only a grocery shop, but she also sells children's toys and accessories, attractive enough for increasing her daily income.

Ezdihar applied for a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua in order to improve her business through increasing the quantities and items she sells.

This loan will also help provide good quality products with affordable prices for her beloved customers.

She hopes to stay in good health and to keep on making her own living in order not to ask for help from others.

loans.use: To improve her business through increasing the quantities and items she sells.

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.es: La Sra. Lourdes vive en la zona del plan 3000, vive en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus tres hijos. Ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta comida en su propio domicilio, también es portera en un colegio donde vende dulces, soda, panchito, asadito, alitas. El crédito que está solicitando es para la compra de  insumos como papa, aceite, fideo para la venta de comida y  de esta manera incrementar su capital de trabajo ya que este tiempo aumenta su clientela y necesita incrementar su capital para comprar mesas y sillas. Su esposo es camarógrafo editor y también le ayuda con la venta de comida, con el anterior crédito le fue muy bien sigue creciendo en su actividad  La Sra. Lourdes es una persona con muchas ganas de superación que al lado de su esposo se esfuerzan para darles un futuro mejor a sus hijos ya que su deseo es verlos profesionales. La Sra. Lourdes es un apersona muy trabajadora se siente muy feliz por la oportunidad bridada en la otorgación del crédito.
texts.en: Lourdes lives in the area of Plan 3000. She lives in her own  house with her husband and their three children. She is dedicated to making and selling food in her own house. Also, she is a caretaker in a high school where she sells sweets, soda, hot dogs, barbecue and wings.
