The loan that she is requesting is to buy ingredients like potatoes, oil, noodles for the sale of food and, in this way, increase her working capital since this time her customers are increasing and she needs to increase her capital to buy tables and chairs. Her husband is photographic editor and also helps her selling food. The previous loan went very well continuing to grow her work. Lourdes is a person with a lot of desire to get ahead. With her husband's at her side, they work hard to give their children a better future since it their wish to see them become professionals. Lourdes is a very hard working person who feels happy for the opportunity provided with the loan granted.

loans.use: to buy oil, noodles, rice and potatoes to make her food.

loans.name: Yelena

texts.ru:
Елена – частный предприниматель из Новой Каховки. Она уже 9 лет занимается торговлей детской одеждой на городском рынке. На данный момент ее оборотный капитал составляет 15 000 гривен. Чистая прибыль составляет около 5 000 гривен. 

Елене необходим кредит в 5 000 гривен для того, чтобы пополнить ассортимент одежды на продажу на имеющиеся деньги и соответственно получить больше прибыли от реализованного товара. 
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Elena is an entrepreneur from Novaya Kahovka. She has been working with trade of children's clothing at the village market for 9 years already. Currently her working capital is 15,000 hryvnia. Her net income is around 5,000 hryvnia. 

Elena needs a loan of 5,000 hryvnia in order to supplement the assortment of clothing available sale based on her current capital, and thus make more profit on goods sold.

loans.use: to supplement the assortment of children's clothing for sale

loans.name: Vanna

texts.en:
Vanna is 50 years old. She is widowed and blessed with a daughter in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. 

She has been involved cultivating rice and fattening up animals for more than 20 years, earning approximately $2 per day. Her daughter is a garment worker who earns about $4 per day. 

Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Vanna is requesting a loan of $550 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase would enable her to use the saved money on her transportation expenses to support her family. 

In the future, she would like to expand her business and rebuild her present house to make it bigger and much stronger for her family.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting.

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James is a 34-year-old hardworking man living in Kasese, Uganda. 

He has been in commercial farming, dealing in rice and maize, for two years.

His hardships are price fluctuations and inflation, seasonal weather and inadequate capital to buy the necessary farm inputs.

His personal goals are educating his children, building a permanent house and upgrading his studies.

His business goal is buying land to grow more crops and venturing into mechanized agriculture.

James wants a loan to pay workers who are weeding and harvesting his crops.

loans.use: to pay workers who are weeding and harvesting his crops.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy books to sell.

loans.name: George

texts.en:
George is 42 years old and lives in the town of Antequera, Bohol, with his family. 

He runs a transportation business and a hog-raising business that enable him to support his family. George works hard to improve his earnings and sustain his family. 

He requested a loan to purchase piglets, feed and motorcycle spare parts. George hopes to increase his profit and be able to elevate his family's standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase piglets, feed and motorcycle spare parts.

loans.name: Andrei

texts.ru:
Андрей – из Великой Знаменки. Он уже 7 лет занимается ремонтом и торговлей компьютерной и бытовой техникой. Андрей выбрал для себя именно эту группу товаров, так как он хорошо знает бытовую технику и неплохо разбирается в компьютерных технологиях. По образованию он – физик-ядерщик, работал на АЭС в Энергодаре, ушел с того места работы по состоянию здоровья и занялся предпринимательством. В товаре у него сейчас около 210 000 гривен. 

Андрей планирует использовать кредит КИВА в размере 20 000 гривен для того, чтобы закупить бытовую технику для последующей ее реализации. Летом такой товар пользуется хорошим спросом и торговля всегда идет хорошо, поэтому Андрею и хотелось бы в это время увеличить количество товара, чтобы удачно его реализовать. Этот бизнес – основной источник дохода клиента. В его деле наблюдается хороший рост, есть планы на дальнейшее развитие. В ближайшем будущем Андрей планирует построить на рынке большой киоск для хранения и реализации бытовой техники. 
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Andrei is from Velikaya Znamenka. He has worked with repairing and selling computers and household appliances for seven years. Andrei chose this specific type of goods as he knows household appliances well and understands computer technology well. By profession he is a nuclear scientist, and he has worked at the nuclear power plant in Energodar. He went over to this type of work for health reasons and started to do business. He currently has goods worth around 210,000 hryvnia. 

Andrei plans to use the loan from Kiva, of the amount of 20,000 hryvnia, to purchase household appliances for selling in the future. In the summer this type of goods is in demand and the sale is always good, and therefore Andrei would like to increase the amount of goods at this time, in order to successfully get them sold.

This business is the main source of income for this entrepreneur. There has been a strong growth in his business, and there are plans to further develop it. In the near future, Andrei plans to build a large selling point at the market for storage and selling of household appliances.

loans.use: to purchase household appliances for selling

loans.name: Sok

texts.en:
Sok is 33 years old. He is a married and blessed with two children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. 

He has been a chef for more than ten years, earning approximately $3 per day. His wife runs a business of purchasing maize to resell. She earns about $6 per day. 

Because his house’s land is flooded, Sok is requesting a loan of $1,500 to purchase dirt to fill up his land. This money will help him prevent floods. In the future, he would like to expand his business and send his children to a good school.

loans.use: to purchase dirt to fill up his land.

loans.name: Maria Edilberta

texts.es:
María, se dedica a la venta de pan dulce y café, tiene 47 años de edad, vive con su esposo y dos hijos de 14 y 20 años de edad, el negocio de María consiste en la venta de pan dulce y café tiene 10 años de estar dedicada a este negocio y lo realiza por las tardes con ayuda de uno de sus hijos.
Ella necesita invertir en el negocio, para esto solicita un préstamo que le ayude a realizar la compra del pan y café, además quiere ampliar el negocio ofreciendo también bebidas refrescantes, esto le ayudará a ir creciendo y a variar los productos en el negocio, aumentando la posibilidad de ganar mayores ingresos.
El objetivo de ella es ampliar el negocio, y sus hijos terminen sus estudios y puedan tener la oportunidad de un trabajo, también poder mejorar a futuro las instalaciones de la vivienda.
texts.en: Maria is dedicated to selling sweet bread and coffee. She is 47 years old. She lives with her husband and their two children, 14 and 20 years old. Maria's business consists of selling sweet bread and coffee. She has been dedicated to this business for ten years and performs it in the afternoons with the help of one of her sons. She needs to invest in the business. For this, she is requesting a loan that will help her purchase bread and coffee. Additionally, she wants to expand the business by also offering refreshing drinks. This will help her to grow and vary the products in the business, expanding the possibility to earn greater income. Her objective is to expand the business and that her children finish their education and can have the opportunity to work, as well as to be able to improve, in the future, her house.

loans.use: to buy bread and coffee and refreshing drinks.

loans.name: Guillermina

texts.es:
Guillermina es de la comarca llama La  Rita, Teustepe casada tiene 3 hijas mujeres.Guillermina se dedica a la compra y venta de carbón desde hace 13 años negocio que empezó con esfuerzo propio con pocas ventas, después fue aumentando su negocio con crédito que sacaba en otras instituciones también  tiene el apoyo del marido quien cultiva maíz, frijol y trigo además sus hijas le ayudan a vender ya que el negocio lo tiene en su casa. Hoy Guillermina quiere este crédito para comprar carbón ya que se acerca el invierno y se necesita tener bastante inventario de este producto.  
Ella  dice que una vez que pague su crédito lo que le quede de ganancia siempre lo invertirá en el negocio o comprar verduras para vender y así obtener  otros ingresos.
texts.en:
Guillermina is from the region called La Rita, Teustepe. She is married and has three grown daughters. Gullermina has made a living buying and selling coal for 13 years, a business which she started through her own efforts with very little sales. Afterwards she made her business better with loans she got from other organizations. She also has the help of her husband, who cultivates corn, beans, and wheat. On top of that, her daughters help her to sell, since the business is in their house. 

Guillermina wants this loan today for the purchase of coal, since winter is coming up and she needs to have a big inventory of this product. 

She says that as soon as she pays off her loan, she'll use the rest of her earnings to invest in the business or purchase vegetables to sell and in that way earn more income.

loans.use: to buy coal.

loans.name: Nina

texts.ru:
Нина – вдова. У нее две взрослые дочки. Нина живет в городке Королево, занимается продажей продуктов питания. Ее торговая точка находится в самом центре рынка, конкуренция небольшая. В этой сфере Нина работает только 2 года. В товаре у нее 50 000 гривен, валовый доход составляет 18 000 гривен, чистая прибыль – около 5 000 гривен. 

Нине необходим кредит в 10 000 гривен для того, чтобы увеличить ассортимент продуктовых товаров, а именно круп и мучных изделий. За счет увеличения объемов реализуемых товаров Нина сможет увеличить и свой доход. В ее дальнейших планах – постепенное расширение торговой точки и увеличение оборотов. 
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Nina is a widow. She has two grown-up children. Nina lives in the city of Korolyovo, and works with selling food products. Her retail outlet is at the very center of the market, and the competition is not large. Nina has worked in this area for only two years. She has products worth around 50,000 hryvnia, her gross income is around 18,000 hryvnia and the net income around 5,000 hryvnia. 

Nina needs a loan of 10,000 hryvnia in order to increase the assortment of products, mainly cereals and bakery products. By increasing the volume of products sold, Nina can also increase her income. Her further plans are to stepwise expand her outlet and increase her turnover.

loans.use: to increase the assortment of food products for sale, mainly cereals and bakery products

loans.name: Nason

texts.en: Nason is a 32-year-old married man with eight children living in Kasese, Uganda. He has been operating a retail shop for 16 years. His hardships are price fluctuation, inflation, high fuel costs, and inadequate capital to purchase  enough stock. Nason's personal goals are to educate his children and build a permanent house for his family. His business goals are to diversify his business to include farming. Nason intends to use the money from this loan to buy sugar, salt and soap to sell since the demand has now increased.

loans.use: to buy sugar, salt and soap to sell

loans.name: Ernesto Antonio

texts.es:
Ernesto, vive con sus padres en casa propia, está soltero, trabaja en la reparación y mantenimiento de computadoras, desde hace un año inició en su pequeño taller el cual surgió por su propia iniciativa y hasta el momento no ha presentado ningún inconveniente.
El solicita un préstamo para comprar repuestos y accesorios para las computadoras como lo son teclados, tarjetas de memoria, mauses, CD, y  otros, que son necesarios para realizar este trabajo espera que con este préstamo pueda brindar un mejor servicio a la clientela.
La superacion de Ernesto es tener un local propio y amplio donde atender a los clientes que sea más cómodo que le permita mejorar su apariencia, también poderles ayudar a su familia una mejor condición.
texts.en: Ernesto lives with his parents in their own house. He is single. He works on repairing and maintaining computers. A year ago, he started his small shop, which emerged by his own initiative and, until now, has not faced any challenges. He is requesting a loan to buy parts and accessories for computers, such as keyboards, memory cards, mice, CD and other things which are necessary to perform this work. He hopes that with this loan he can provide better service to his customers. Ernesto's wish is to have his own shop and expand where attending to customers is more comfortable and allows him to improve his reputation, as well as to be able to help his family be in a better condition.

loans.use: to purchase keyboards, memory cards, mice and CDs.

loans.name: José Daniel

texts.es:
Don Daniel, reside en el departamento de Masaya,  casado,  tiene la edad de 41 años, de oficio mecánico, con 22 años de experiencia, empezó como trabajor, pero con el tiempo el desidio poner su propio taller de mecánica en el que actualmente tiene ya 10 años de obtenerlo, su núcleo familiar es de 4 sus dos hijos y su esposa, cuenta con tres trabajadores sus dos  hijos y un trabajador  mas,  que le ayudan a dar el servicio de repacion de vehículos. Esta necesitando comprar unos materiales tales como alambre de cobre esmaltado calibre # 17, y calibre # 19.

Se acerca  a nuestra oficina para solicitar un préstamo que le permitirá abastecer su negocio en el material que mas necesita,  considera que este crédito le ayudara a dar un mejor servicio en su negocio y dará mejores condiciones de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Daniel lives in the department of Masaya. He is 41 years old and married. He works as a mechanic and has 22 years experience. He started as an employee but after a time he decided to start his own mechanics’ workshop, which he has now had for 10 years. 

His nuclear family is comprised of four people, his two children and his wife. He relies on three workers: his two children and another worker, who help him to repair vehicles.

He needs to buy materials such as #17 caliber and #19 caliber enamelled copper wire. He approached our office to ask for a loan which will allow him to supply his business with the materials he needs. He considers that this loan will help him to provide a better service in his business and provide better living conditions for his family.

loans.use: #17 caliber and #19 caliber enamelled copper wire.

loans.name: Vitalyi

texts.ru:
Виталий с супругой и двумя сыновьями живет в Ивано-Франковске. Он работает в одном из местных транспортных агентств, предоставляя транспортные услуги на территории Украины. Виталий занимается этим бизнесом уже 7 лет. На руки получает около 5 000 гривен чистого дохода. По специальности Виталий – бармен-повар. Раньше он работал поставщиком на строительной фирме, потом рассчитался и начал работать в сфере предоставления транспортных услуг, так как его устраивает неплохой заработок и гибкий график работы. 

Виталий хотел бы вложить кредит в 10 000 гривен в переоснащение автомобиля с грузового в пассажирский. Виталий некоторое время работал на грузовом бусе. Теперь он хочет переоборудовать свое грузовое транспортное средство на пассажирский минивэн, потому что минивэны пользуются большей популярностью среди клиентов-заказчиков и заказы оплачиваются в 1.5 раза выше, нежели грузовые автомобили.  
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Vitalyi lives in Ivano-Frankivsk together with his wife and two sons. He works at one of the local transport agencies, offering transport services in Ukraine. Vitalyi has worked with this business for 7 years already. He receives around 5,000 hryvnia in net income. 

Vitalyi is a chef and bartender by profession. Earlier he worked as a catering supplier for a building company. Then he settled the accounts and started working in the area of offering transport services, because it gives a good income and a flexible work schedule. 

Vitalyi would like to receive a loan of 10,000 hryvnia for the refitting of his vehicle from cargo to passenger. Vitalyi has worked in with cargo for some time. Currently he wants to convert his cargo vehicle to a minivan for passengers, because minivans are more popular among the customers. The bookings give 1.5 times more money than for cargo vehicles.

loans.use: to convert his cargo vehicle to a minivan for passengers.

loans.name: Sokhom

texts.en:
Sokhom is 38 years old. She is a mother of four children and resides with her husband in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has been selling groceries for more than ten years, earning approximately $15 per day. Her husband is a policeman who earns about $4 per day. All of her children are still in her care.

 In order to improve her family’s livelihood, Sokhom is requesting a loan of $1250 to raise capital in her business to purchase more groceries to resell. By doing so, she would generate more income to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her grocery store and help her children earn a bachelor’s degree. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it more convenient for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to resell

loans.name: Robert

texts.en:
Robert is a 39-year-old married man with five children living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. For seven years he has been operating a barber shop and has been able to secure customer loyalty in the area. 

High fuel and inadequate capital to meet the various needs of his customers are the main hardships he is facing. However, his personal goals are to educate his children, build a permanent house and buy a car while his business goals are to move his business to new markets and have a modern salon.

Robert intends to buy two standard shaving machines and a sterilizer since the number of customers has increased and he wants to serve them better.

loans.use: to  buy shaving machines and a sterilizer  for the salon.

loans.name: Cristy

texts.en:
This is Cristy, 56, a resident of Quezon City, Philippines. She is married to Merwin, a tailor; and a mother to their child. By the grace of God, Cristy has managed to support her child’s schooling up to college level. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Cristy operates a door mat business. Her products are small rugs and larger doormats. She makes door mats out of excess textile cloth she buys from the factory. As rugs are a major part of Filipino housekeeping and cleaning, rugs are one of the most common products that can be bought, sometimes even from a peddler while you are riding in a speeding jeepney down the highway.She makes the mats by herself and she directly sells them to her neighbors and the local community, as well as to suppliers. She earns a minimum of Php 550 in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a Php 10,000 loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy more quantities of raw materials like fabric and thread. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business.  

Cristy hopes that God will use her and her family in advancing His kingdom, just as she hopes to see her daughter finish college. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for textiles needed in her business.

loans.name: Nancy Prudencia

texts.es: La Sra. Nancy es cliente antigua de la institución, en el crédito anterior también era cliente Kiva, ella se dedica a la venta de frutas de temporada, en esta época se encuentra vendiendo locoto, limones y limas, pero ya llega la cosecha de naranja sy mandarinas, fruta que trae de sus propiedades de los yungas, por lo que solicita este crédito para realizar esa actividad y traslado de esa mercadería.  Su esposo tiene un  taxi que lo trabaja especialmente por la zona central, ambos con su esfuerzo y con los préstamos de la institución lograron construir su casa donde viven con sus dos hijos en edad escolar, y otros dos hijos mayores quienes formaron su propio hogar, la Sra., Nancy es una cliente responsable quien trabaja con nosotros desde hace diez años, son clientes muy responsables, con el anterior crédito le fue muy bien, se siente feliz y agradecido por la oportunidad que le brindan.
texts.en: Nancy is a long-time client of the institution. With her previous credit she also worked with Kiva.  She sells seasonal fruits.  Currently she is selling locoto (a type of pepper), lemons and limes, but soon the harvest of oranges and tangerines will arrive, fruit that she brings from her property in the "yungas" or warmer valleys.  For this reason she is asking for credit in order to accomplish this activity of transporting her product.  Her husband has a taxi and he works especially in the central zone.  Both with their effort and with the loans from the institution they were able to construct the house where they live with their two school-age children, as well as with two older children who form their own family.  Nancy is a responsible client who has worked with our organization for the past ten years.  Her clients are very responsible.  With her previous credit she did very well.  She feels happy and grateful for the opportunity that the credit has brought.

loans.use: For the transport of oranges and tangerines from the locality of los Yungas to the city of la Paz.

loans.name: Alexander

texts.ru:
Александр живет и работает в Мелитополе. Он реализует хозяйственные и промышленные товары, а также посуду, кухонные принадлежности и прочее на центральном рынке города. Точка Александра всегда привлекает большим выбором товаров по приемлемым ценам. Свое дело Александр начал 13 лет назад. Его оборотный капитал составляет 18 000 гривен. 

Александр планирует вложить кредит в 18 000 гривен в увеличение ассортимента хозтоваров для увеличения оборота и получения дополнительной прибыли. Александр нашел для себя приемлемое направление в бизнесе. Он планирует и дальше развивать бизнес и улучшать быт своей семьи. За счет полученной дополнительной прибыли в этом сезоне планирует отдохнуть семьей на море. 
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Alexander lives and works in Melitopol. He sells household and industrial products, as well as dishes, kitchenware and so on at the city's central market. Alexander's outlet always has a great selection of products at acceptable prices.

Alexander started his business 13 years ago. His working capital is 18,000 hryvnia. Alexander plans to invest the loan of 18,000 hryvnia in increasing the assortment of household products in order to increase the turnover and receive additional income. 

Alexander has found a satisfactory type of business for himself. He plans to both further develop his business and improve the daily life for his family. Due to the additional income he receives in this season he plans to go on vacation with his family by the sea.

loans.use: increase the assortment of household products to increase turnover

loans.name: Charles

texts.en: Charles is a forty-four-year-old married man with four children living in Kasese, Uganda. He has been a health worker for twelve years. He works in a government hospital and he used his salary savings to start a clinic in his village since his community had no nearby health unit. His challenge is the inadequate capital to have a standard clinic and his dream is to have a fully fledged medical center. Charles intends to use the loan to buy lab equipment for his clinic.

loans.use: to buy lab equipment for his clinic.

loans.name: Julanda

texts.en:
Julanda is a 44-year-old married woman. She has five children. She describes herself to be an aggressive businesswoman. She operates a retail stall where she sells clothes. She has been involved in this business for more than six years.

Julanda's business is located within a busy market and her primary customers are passersby. She describes her biggest business challenge to be stiff competition within the area. She will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy more clothes.

Julanda, also does farming whereby earlier on she had taken a loan of Kes 20,000 which she managed to repay well.  Her business goal is to own business premises for selling clothes within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will be a succesful businesswoman.

loans.use: to buy more clothes.

loans.name: Margret

texts.en: Margret is a 34-year-old married woman with four children living in Kasese, Uganda. She has been teaching for two years and is so proud of her profession, since she is able to interact with and inspire the young. Her personal goals are educating her children and building a permanent house to use as her residence, since she now has a semi-permanent house. Margret wants money to pay school fees and to renovate her house.

loans.use: to pay school fees and to renovate her house.
